blocks.headline: TinaCMS: The perfect partner for your documentation.
blocks.text: Leverage the power of Markdown and Git-backed content to elevate your open-source documentation projects.

blocks.content:
## Simplify your documentation with TinaCMS

TinaCMS can be added to your Git-based documentation sites with ease. TinaCMS provides an easy-to-use interface that your editors and developers will love.

items.headline: Markdown-based content
items.text: Utilize the simplicity of Markdown for creating and managing your documentation content.

items.headline: Flexible User Interaction
items.text: TinaCMS allows users to interact via Git for those who prefer it, while others can use the CMS. This creates a flexible, user-friendly environment.

items.headline: Framework-Agnostic
items.text: TinaCMS works with all popular web development frameworks. You are not locked into a specific technology stack.

items.headline: Open-Source Friendly
items.text: TinaCMS integrates seamlessly with open-source projects, supporting community contributions to your documentation.

items.headline: Static and Dynamic
items.text: Query your Markdown content like you would with a headless CMS. Tinaâ€™s GraphQL Data Layer supports filtering, sorting, pagination, and more.

items.headline: Develop Locally
items.text: Run Tina locally and talk to your local filesystem. This makes for an amazing developer experience while building your docs site.

blocks.headline: Ready to upgrade your documentation?
blocks.text: Get started with TinaCMS for your documentation projects.

seo.description: Enhance your open-source documentation projects with TinaCMS. Benefit from markdown-based content, flexible user interactions, and cross-framework compatibility.
